'''Lunar New Year of the Ox''' is a [[skin pack]] created by NetEase, celebrating the [[w:Year of the Ox|Year of the Ox]], as part of [[w:Lunar New Year|Lunar New Year]].<ref>{{Mcnet|happy-lunar-new-year|Happy Lunar New Year|February 8, 2021|Staff}}</ref>
